segments.text: Can I use your laptop for a while ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , isn't your computer Wi-Fi capable ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . You want go online ? there are no wi-fi hotspots around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh my , no internet access is killing me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can't you wait till you get home ? then you can surf the internet using the broadband , wireless connection or whatever you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm not feeling myself . I just want to check my emails , visit my favorite websites and chat with my friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now I see , you must be suffering from discomgoogolation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does that mean ? there's nothing wrong with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the term ' discomgoogolation ' comes from ' discombobulate ' and ' google ' . Because floods of information are just a mouse click away , net users are very likely to become addicted to the web .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's alright . I just can't bear losing track of all the latest information . It almost drives me crazy .
segments.speaker: S1
